entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Activator.CreateInstance<T> does not bring compile error or throw exception for required property #102734
  • Assertion failed 'IS_ALIGNED(addr, byteSize)' #102732
  • sslStream.NegotiatedApplicationProtocol is empty after TLS1.3 renegotiation on Windows #102731
  • Raise the AppDomain.UnhandledException event from Objective-C bridge #102730
  • Mac Catalyst (arm64): Attempting to JIT compile method '...' while running in aot-only mode. #102728
  • DispatchProxy throws TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102716
  • ILC: Assertion failed '(unsigned)reg < ArrLen(regMasks)' in '...' during 'Generate code' (IL size 6; hash 0x04901a61; FullOpts) #102715
  • [Android] Runtime sample app and test crash with OpenJDK 21 #102714
  • Unhandled exception. System.Net.Http.HttpRequestException: No such host is known. (https:80) #102710
  • [MSVC][permissive] Resolving C4146 Error in MSVC Compilation with /permissive Flag #102708
  • Test failure: GC\\Features\\HeapExpansion\\Finalizer\\Finalizer.cmd #102706

Closed

  • Add NetBSD version of CLI #5123
  • Comparing test results #5467
  • Linux/ARM: location of binary packages for arm/arm64 #5488
  • Use -stable, -unstable, and -yolo for package pre-release versions across NuGet, MyGet, and CI feeds. #5858
  • Build verbose generates very long command line #5490
  • Possible to license or use a version of clrdbg outside vscode or visual studio? #7052
  • How to profile the ni.dll from crossgen? #7502
  • GCStress is not safe when not using per-thread allocation contexts #7670
  • [SOS] Intermittent Connection Issues with HttpClient in .NET 6 #101407
  • run-xunit-perf should handle multiple scenarios in one test #7930
  • ilasm produces wrong SequencePoints when a method references several Documents #102198
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102623
    9.0.0
  • [7.0] Globalization IcuAppLocalTests .TestIcuAppLocal test failure #88742
    7.0.x
  • System.Management.Tests fails with "CONTRACT VIOLATION by LoaderAllocator::SetHandleValue" #102719
  • [API Proposal]: Add CallerType attribute to tell the method the current type that is invoking the current member. #102725
  • [API Proposal]: AsyncContext for cancellation and ConfigureAwait #102111
  • NativeAOT can report wrong sizes of native structs #75666
    Future
  • Overriding global serialization options with `JsonConverterAttribute` behaves unexpectedly #102712
  • String.ToUpper with Turkish CultureInfo doesn't work on Android #102622
  • [tvos-arm64] System.Runtime.Serialization.Xml.XsdDataContractExporterTests.ExporterTypesTests.TypesTest failed #101549
    9.0.0
  • Fix Task Library Async Causality Stack Reconstruction #11474
  • Add parameter to Except to allow non-uniqueness #102707
  • System.Collections.Generic.List<T> constructor overload for initializing with pre-determined "size" #102662
  • Problem when adding null as "Cookie" in HttpHeaders.Add #102697
  • apphost.exe not created for TestTrimming=true + TestNativeAot=true #102632
  • Queries regarding Custom Profile Guided Optimization (PGO) #13337

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix SIMD12 spills #102736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve Ascii.FromUtf16 and FromHexString #102735
    area-System.Text.Encoding, 9.0.0
  • Fix config binding generator ValueType defaults #102733
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable downlevel tests for non-main branches in non-simple WasmBuildTests #102722
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix DispatchProxy throwing TypeLoadException for static virtual members #102718
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Introduce `SwiftSelf<T>` and `SwiftIndirectResult` structs #102717
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • Use new package for tracking SDK version number #102713
    area-Infrastructure
  • [LoongArch64] Synchronize with PR#102592. #102711
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64

Merged

  • ilasm support for methods with multiple documents #102199
    area-ILTools-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Http2Connection throws misleading exceptions on ping timeouts #102691
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Revert "Avoid clearing thread local handles for already unloaded loader" #102729
    area-VM-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Fix invalid operand register in the emitted addition/subtraction code #102074
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Update SDK to 9.0 preview 4 #102604
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Disable Loader pri-1 tests that don't compile #102709
    needs-area-label
  • Stop guessing if a type is blittable #102645
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Re-enable CertificateValidationClientServer_EndToEnd_Ok in Windows Native AOT #102517
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Baseline tests in CoreMangLib subtree #102648
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

Updated

  • [release/8.0-staging] Backport 1ES templates #102681
    area-Infrastructure
  • CI test #99871
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use PayloadReader in System.Resources.Extensions #102379
    area-System.Resources, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 9.0.0
  • forbid http request with invalid version #102423
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • Update the JIT to support rewriting more complex intrinsics as user calls #102702
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Content-Length header not always returned when enumerating HttpContentHeaders #102416
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Socket.DontFragment can't be set on IPv6 DualMode sockets #102700
    area-System.Net.Sockets, community-contribution
  • AVX10.1 API introduction in JIT #101938
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Conservative fix for struct stores in optRemoveRedundantZeroInits #102580
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Adjust repro file message for merged test #102141
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Use generic math for floating point formatting #102683
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • JIT: Fix LA64 and RISCV64 build errors on Windows #100099
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT][hybridglobalization] Run `HybridGlobalization` threading tests #102595
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization, os-browser
  • Reduce memory usage when updating ZipArchives #102704
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • [NO REVIEW]Activate some H/3 tests and make usage of ConfigureAwait(false) more consistent on H/3 #102699
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • NonBacktracking Regex optimizations #102655
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Add pseudoinstructions to disassembler #102260
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Align LA64 targetpacks with RV64 #102628
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-loongarch64, arch-riscv
  • Add randomized allocation sampling #100356
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fold identical method bodies in the compiler #101969
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Support for HTTP/3 multiple connections #101531
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Optimize "(vec & cns) == zero" on arm64 #102705
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support TLS Resume with client certificates on Linux #102656
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Fix test results publishing for host and illink tests #102635
    area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for primary constructors in LoggerMessageGenerator #101660
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Add JsonPascalCaseNamingPolicy #100017
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Delete test testing a weird delegate implementation detail #102647
    needs-area-label
